title: The Trumpslide beginneth
author: VD
content_html: Americans can, for once, be genuinely proud of their President and Tweeter-in-Chief. You know, maybe the Academy should have him host the Oscars. He’s certainly funnier than the average Hollywood comedian these days.
content_text:
Americans can, for once, be genuinely proud of their President and
Tweeter-in-Chief
. You know, maybe the Academy should have him host the Oscars. He’s certainly funnier than the average Hollywood comedian these days.
